text:
10. The Chemtrail Conspiracy

The chemtrail conspiracy theory posits that white trails left behind by

airplanes are actually chemicals or biological agents being deliberately

sprayed for nefarious purposes (Chemtrails, 2020). Proponents argue that the

trails are evidence of a government or corporate plot to control the population

or manipulate the weather. However, experts have thoroughly debunked these

claims, citing the lack of credible evidence and the fact that the trails are
